com.citytechinc.aem.bedrock.core.services
Class AbstractSlingService

java.lang.Object
  com.citytechinc.aem.bedrock.core.services.AbstractSlingService

public abstract class AbstractSlingService
extends Object

Base class for services that require an administrative Session and/or ResourceResolver.

Method Detail

activate

protected abstract void activate(org.osgi.service.component.ComponentContext componentContext,
                                 Map<String,Object> properties)
Activate this service. Extending classes should call getAdministrativeResourceResolver() and/or getAdministrativeSession() in this method.

deactivate

protected abstract void deactivate(org.osgi.service.component.ComponentContext componentContext,
                                   Map<String,Object> properties)
Deactivate this service. Extending classes should call closeResourceResolver() and closeSession() in this method.

closeResourceResolver

protected final void closeResourceResolver()
Close the administrative resource resolver. This method should be called by the @Deactivate method of the implementing class if the getAdministrativeResourceResolver() method was used at any time.

closeSession

protected final void closeSession()
Close the administrative session. This method should be called by the @Deactivate method of the implementing class if the getAdministrativeSession() method was used at any time.

getAdministrativeResourceResolver

protected final ResourceResolver getAdministrativeResourceResolver()
                                                            throws LoginException
Get an administrative resource resolver.

Returns:
resource resolver
Throws:
LoginException - if error occurs during authentication

protected final Session getAdministrativeSession()
                                          throws RepositoryException
Get an administrative JCR session.

Returns:
session
Throws:
RepositoryException - if error occurs during authentication

Returns:
configuration wrapper
